page.title: 16A day in the life of a child
page.content: When there's no school I wake up at seven o clock. I{read a book}till half past seven. At half past seven I {practise the piano.}After that I have my breakfast. For{breakfast}I have Ready Break,crumpet and a cup of tea. Then I go upstairs, wash and clean my teeth and get dressed. When I am dressed I go downstairs and brush my hair after that I go out to play. I {play rounders}with my brothers and sister. Then I have{dinner.}I would normally have chips and fishfingers. After dinner we go{shopping.}When we come back we go for a{walk.}For{tea}I have sandwhiches or soup after that I have a{game of monopoly}or another board game. After that I watch {television}and at nine o clock I go to bed.
